actions.description: The aberration makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down)
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Ranged spell attack: Your spell attack modifier to hit, range 150 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level psychic damage
actions.name: Eye Ray (Beholderkin only)

actions.description: Your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 3 + the spell's level slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the aberration's next turn
actions.name: Claws (slaadi only)

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level psychic damage
actions.name: Psychic Slam (Star spawn only)

languages: Deep Speech, understands the languages the summoner speaks To
name: Aberrant Spirit

specialTraits.description: The aberration regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point
specialTraits.name: Regeneration (Slaadi only)

specialTraits.description: At the start of each of the aberration's turns, each creature within 5 feet of the aberration must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or take 2d6 psychic damage, provided that the aberration isn't incapacitated
specialTraits.name: Whispering Aura (Star Spawn Only).
